text: The 2019 FIBA U16 European Championship was the 33rd edition of the Under-16 European Basketball Championship. The competition took place from 9 to 17 August 2019 in Udine, Italy. The top five teams qualified for the 2020 FIBA Under-17 Basketball World Cup besides Bulgaria who automatically qualified as host. The defending champions are Croatia. ==Participating teams== * (2nd at 2018 Division B) * * * * * * * * * * (3rd at 2018 Division B) * (1st at 2018 Division B) * * * * ==Venues== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !Udine !Pasian di Prato |rowspan="4"| |- |Palasport Primo Carnera |Palazzetto Mario Vecchiato |- |Capacity: 3,850 |Capacity: |} ==Preliminary round== The draw ceremony was held on 13 December 2018 in Belgrade, Serbia. ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- ===Group C=== \---- \---- ===Group D=== \---- \---- ==Final round== ===Main Bracket=== ===Round of 16=== ===Quarterfinals=== ===Semifinals=== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==5th–8th Classification== ===5–8th place semifinals=== ===Seventh place game=== ===Fifth place game=== ==9th–16th Classification== ===9–16th place quarterfinals=== ===9–12th place semifinals=== ===Eleventh place game=== ===Ninth place game=== ==13th–16th Classification== ===13–16th place semifinals=== ===15th place game=== ===13th place game=== ==Final standings== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor="#ccffcc"| || Qualified for the 2020 FIBA Under-17 Basketball World Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor="#ffcccc"| || |Team relegated to 2020 Division B |} {|class=wikitable style="text- align:center;"| |- !Rank !! width=190|Team !!
